TopicTitle: [0.23]Cargo Transfer Bags and Tanks(for TAC life support) 0.7

Articles.Content: Currently the "Foodbag" wouldn't be too bad if it has water in it because it has no specific design that states it's just pure food. On the other hand, I'll give you textures of combined tanks, it'll be easy to do, just post the two resource you want here. I initially tried to do this but I found that a few more 1024x1024 texture might take a toll on a heavily modded ksp. But if you want it, I won't hesitate to give it to you.

As you can see I did left out the food + water option on the bag in the 1.5:1 TACLS consumption ratio.

So please help with the texture and thank you in advance for the tank ones.
I read the title as "crew transfer bags". I got spooked. Nice mod.
I need to reinstall my PC, but after that I may have some free time and try to integrate a science container module to the bag. No promises, but if it is not much of a work can you velcro it ?

I need to reinstall my PC, but after that I may have some free time and try to integrate a science container module to the bag. No promises, but if it is not much of a work can you velcro it ?

Im not sure how to design it, I kind of like the design as it is.

I remapped the UVs of the tanks and made a two resource texture. Well, 3 of it. O2-C02, H20-Waste and LFO-Oxidizer

Here's the link, put the folder in the same place as CargoTransferbags and PressurizedSupplyTank

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/dg2yyjtoammpfvb/AACVCp6dI-3p-rzY6NDbrh1Ya?dl=0

Very good textures! Just 1 request - make the caps of the LFO orange or red ? White is OK, but those are flammable liquid and catalizator stored next to each other. So something more flashy and warning worthy than white, please.

I thought about the other 2 duo options, but thought it will make too many options. The decision to split it into different parts may be the sane idea.

Also have u considered painting the bottoms of both types of duo tanks, so the labels will look like glued to {color name} colored tank. Like the waste water is.

I'll see what I can do but most of the tanks, especially the Oxygen Tank were like tanks that just had diamond stickers on it. Well, this here is a good reference

This is the reason why the tank isn't fully colored in one color.
Good point. Then the request remains only for the flammable stuff. So red cap it is.
I'll put up the red in the cap for Liquid Fuel as soon as I can both in the single resource and duo.
I assume this mod will work as it is in 0.90? or will it need updating?
I think the one on the OP works as well. My latest works too.

After moding my KSP my save became too complicated to deal with, so I started over.

I find the bags and tanks so useful in my experience in early game ...

Frankly in my original save where I used "Cargo Transfer Rovers"instead I could not find much use, but now they will be useful for great amount of time before I go heavy duty.

Btw, how are the cones going ?

Also @blackhearth I need to ask you something in private, but your inbox is overflowing.
I think I may have space now, you can try sending me a private message again.
Is this mod still in development? looking for a 1.0+ compatibility

Is this mod still in development? looking for a 1.0+ compatibility

I'm currently using it in my game now and I haven't noticed anything major wrong with the parts.
